name: Break Arcade Games Out (Open Source)
description:
An open-source game, written entirely on a live stream!

Watch the whole process as I program the game and its engine using the C language live on Twitch. Then, download the source code and play around with it yourself!

Check out the live streams on Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/danzaidan

Check out the recordings on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/DanZaidan

What appears to be a simple Breakout game, may lead to crazy gameplay suprises.
